org.efaps.admin.user.Person

  • Packages that use Person 
    Package Description
    org.efaps.admin.user
    Each class represents a different user type implementation.
    org.efaps.db
    This package contains all classes related to the eFaps-DataBase.
    org.efaps.jaas
    Package for the JAAS integration for eFaps.

    • Uses of Person in org.efaps.jaas

      Methods in org.efaps.jaas that return Person 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Person LoginHandler.checkLogin(String _name, String _passwd)
      The instance method checks if for the given user the password is correct.
      protected Person LoginHandler.createPerson(LoginContext _login)
      The person represented in the JAAS login context is created and associated to eFaps.
      protected Person LoginHandler.getPerson(LoginContext _login)
      For the given JAAS login context the person inside eFaps is searched.
      Methods in org.efaps.jaas with parameters of type Person 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void LoginHandler.updateCompanies(LoginContext _login, Person _person)
      The groups of the given person are updated with the information from the JAAS login context.
      protected void LoginHandler.updateGroups(LoginContext _login, Person _person)
      The groups of the given person are updated with the information from the JAAS login context.
      protected void LoginHandler.updatePerson(LoginContext _login, Person _person)
      The person information inside eFaps is update with information from JAAS login context.
      protected void LoginHandler.updateRoles(LoginContext _login, Person _person)
      The roles of the given person are updated with the information from the JAAS login context.
